attributes.action: apply zero VAT to eBooks the same as paper books, effective immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently eBooks are charged 17.5% VAT unlike their VAT-free paper counterparts which not only encourages a waste of earth's resources but also encourages illegal downloading of ebooks. The EU has already passed a directive allowing lower VAT rates on eBooks from 2011 but we ask the government to start 0% VAT on eBooks immediately.
